widget.name: Combobox
widget.description: Create custom select, autocomplete or multiselect inputs

property.caption: Arrow Offset
property.description: Arrow offset in px

property.caption: Arrow Position
property.description: Arrow position

property.caption: Arrow Radius
property.description: Arrow border-radius in px

property.caption: Arrow Size
property.description: Arrow size in px

property.caption: Children
property.description: Combobox content

property.caption: Disabled
property.description: If set, popover dropdown will not be rendered

property.caption: Dropdown Padding
property.description: Controls padding of the dropdown

property.caption: Floating Strategy
property.description: Changes floating ui position strategy

property.caption: Hide Detached
property.description: If set, the dropdown is hidden when the element is hidden with styles or not visible on the screen

property.caption: Keep Mounted
property.description: If set, the dropdown is not unmounted from the DOM when hidden. display none styles are added instead.

property.defaultValue: { flip: true, shift: true, inline: false }
property.caption: Middlewares
property.description: Floating ui middlewares to configure position handling

property.caption: Offset
property.description: Offset of the dropdown element

property.caption: On Close
property.description: Called when dropdown closes

property.caption: On Dismiss
property.description: Called when the popover is dismissed by clicking outside or by pressing escape

property.caption: On Enter Transition End
property.description: Called when enter transition ends

property.caption: On Exit Transition End
property.description: Called when exit transition ends

property.caption: On Open
property.description: Called when dropdown opens

property.caption: On Option Submit
property.description: Called when item is selected with the Enter key or by clicking it

property.caption: On Position Change
property.description: Called when dropdown position changes

property.caption: Overlay Props
property.description: Props passed down to Overlay component

property.caption: Portal Props
property.description: Props to pass down to the Portal when withinPortal is true

property.caption: Position
property.description: Dropdown position relative to the target element

property.caption: Position Dependencies
property.description: @deprecated : Do not use, will be removed in 9.0

property.caption: Prevent Position Change When Visible
property.description: Prevents popover from flipping/shifting when it the dropdown is visible

property.caption: Radius
property.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius

property.caption: Read Only
property.description: Determines whether the Combobox value can be changed

property.caption: Reset Selection On Option Hover
property.description: Determines whether selection should be reset when option is hovered

property.caption: Return Focus
property.description: Determines whether focus should be automatically returned to control when dropdown closes

property.caption: Shadow
property.description: Key of theme.shadows or any other valid CSS box-shadow value

property.caption: Size
property.description: Controls items font-size and padding

property.caption: Store
property.description: Combobox store, can be used to control combobox state

property.caption: Transition Props
property.description: Props passed down to the Transition component. Use to configure duration and animation type.

property.caption: Width
property.description: Dropdown width, or 'target' to make dropdown width the same as target element

property.caption: With Arrow
property.description: Determines whether component should have an arrow

property.caption: With Overlay
property.description: Determines whether the overlay should be displayed when the dropdown is opened

property.caption: Within Portal
property.description: Determines whether dropdown should be rendered within the Portal

property.caption: ZIndex
property.description: Dropdown z-index
